short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamlines the process of using the LinkedIn internal tools Calltree, Sloq, and Qprod to investigate SFS and VAPI Search queries.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Flagship Search Query Accelerator saves you time when using the internal tools Calltree, Sloq, and Qprod. It will automatically copy the target string for the selected service (either seas-federated-search or voyager-api-search) and parse it into the correct format to be imported into Sloq.

With version 4.0 we have added the VAPI Query Accelerator Tool. This tool allows you to convert a VAPI query directly into a Sloq query without a dependency on the Calltree tool. From the UI, you can find the VAPI query using the inspect network tab. Please note that Calltree is scheduled to be deprecated, so soon the use of SFS Query Accelerator will be deprecated as well.

(This tool is for LinkedIn internal use only)
